title: Make Admin Orders panel match the uploaded cart-style UI

requirements.text: Update the Admin Orders panel UI (frontend) so the orders list and order details visually match the style of the uploaded reference screenshot (cart-style): rounded cards, soft shadows, warm primary accent for totals, clear spacing, and pill/rounded controls.

quotes: Order panel is same this style

acceptanceCriteria: Admin Orders list no longer looks like a plain data table on small screens; it uses card-style rows with rounded corners, border, and soft shadow similar to the cart reference.

Each order row prominently shows: Order #, customer name, item count, total amount (in primary/warm accent), status badge, and a single primary action (e.g., View Details) styled with rounded/pill design.
Spacing, typography hierarchy, and component radii/shadows are consistent with the cart-style sheet aesthetic (rounded-2xl/3xl feel, soft shadows, light borders).
All admin-facing labels remain in English.

requirements.text: Make the Admin Order Details dialog use the same card/list styling as the reference screenshot for the order items section (cart-item style list), including a clear per-item layout and a summary block at the bottom that highlights the total in the warm primary color.

quotes: Order panel is same this style

acceptanceCriteria: In the Order Details dialog, the 'Order Items' section renders items as individual rounded cards (not plain divider rows), with clear quantity emphasis (e.g., “2×” styling) and item name/variant/price readability similar to the cart reference.
The dialog includes a visually distinct summary area (card or separated block) that prominently displays the order total using the warm primary color treatment.
Status update controls in the dialog use rounded/pill button styling consistent with the cart-style controls.

requirements.text: Add/adjust any necessary Tailwind utility classes or local styling (without editing immutable UI component sources) to support the new cart-style order cards and summary blocks across light and dark modes.

quotes: Order panel is same this style

acceptanceCriteria: No changes are made to files under frontend/src/components/ui (composed only).
The updated Admin Orders styling looks correct in both light and dark mode (borders, shadows, and primary accent remain readable).
No regression to existing customer-facing cart/checkout components.

constraints: Do not edit immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, and any sources under frontend/src/components/ui (compose only).
Backend behavior and order data models must remain unchanged for this request.
nonGoals: Adding new backend APIs or changing authorization logic.
Implementing new order fields like discount/tax if they do not already exist in the order model.
Changing the customer-facing cart UI behavior (this request is only to match its visual style in the admin orders panel).
